title: First Look at Colin Firth in 'Bridget Jones's Baby' Arrives
text:
Comments The 'Kingsman: The Secret Service' actor was spotted in London, filming the third installment of 'Bridget Jones' movie series with Renee Zellweger. 
Following the previously-released images of Renee Zellweger on the set of " Bridget Jones's Baby " in London, some new on-set photos have surfaced online. The new photos feature Zellweger with her fake baby bump and her on-screen love interest Colin Firth . Colin reprises his role as Mark Darcy in the third installment of "Bridget Jones" movie series. He was spotted on the set of the movie in front of a building near a park in London. He looked dapper wearing a navy blue suit with a matching electric blue shawl. In one of the photos, he's seen hugging a brunette. Meanwhile, Renee looked messy as a pregnant Bridget wearing a baggy dungarees over a plaid shirt with an oversized cardigan. In the story, Bridget should have gained around 30lbs, but it seems like the new film will feature a slimmer Bridget. Jones was engaged to be married to Darcy at the end of " Bridget Jones: The Edge of Reason ", but it is not clear whether the couple will end up marrying each other because Firth didn't use a wedding ring while filming the movie. While Hugh Grant 's Daniel Cleaver won't be back, the new film introduces a new character played by Patrick Dempsey . Sharon Maguire, who directed the original "Bridget Jones's Diary" in 2001, will return to direct the third film with a script she co-wrote with David Nicholls. "Bridget Jones's Baby" is expected to arrive in the U.S. in 2017.
